DOC.brief_summary: Patients upper ureteral renal stone randomize undergoing ureteroscopy without ureteral access sheath . The sheath design facilitate ureteroscope insertion re-insertion , thus allow fragment basketed . Stone free rate 3 month determine two group . The investigator hypothesize use ureteral access sheath ureteroscopy result improve stone free rate 3 month compare ureteroscopy without use sheath .
DOC.brief_title: Use Ureteral Access Sheath During Ureteroscopy Its Effect Stone Free Rate
DOC.criteria: Upper ureteral ( proximal iliac vessels/iliac crest ) calculus ; Renal calculus ; Normal renal function ; Any stone composition ; Single multiple stone ( plan treatment stone surgery ) ; Age > 18 year ; Able willing return treatment centre followup visit ; AND Signed study consent Ureteric calculus distal level iliac vessels/iliac crest ; Failed ureteroscopy stone ( i.e . first ureteroscopic procedure stone , however prior failed extracorporeal shockwave lithotripsy ( SWL ) acceptable ) ; Bilateral ureteroscopy ; If adjunctive procedure plan post ureteroscopy ( e.g . percutaneous nephrolithotomy , SWL ) ( i.e . know preoperatively ureteroscopic procedure render patient stone free ancillary procedure necessary ) ; If investigator opinion , enrollment would appropriate ; OR Pregnancy
